title: 423: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 (It’s Raining Too Many Men!)
itunes:title: 423: Gabby & Rachel’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 (It’s Raining Too Many Men!)
description:
It’s Bachelorette recap time, broads! Bekah is away so in the meantime Jess is joined by her husband/“Chatty Bro” Evan to discuss the latest episode! They chat their current questions/theories, the yikes group date, the shocking and the love filled 1-on-1’s, and the too soon fantasy suite drama! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
